name: Chimney Drop
description:
Play as Santa to get to the bottom as quick as you can, pick up some candy canes and presents along the way for extra score. Watch out for obstacles as they will slow you down. 

This is my first solo game jam, I encountered several problems and have to sadly say this project is now cancelled as it's very difficult to iron our the problems I have found. You're going to have to ignore the timer as I have found great difficulty in trying to make it reset, therefore, it now counts how long you have had the application open for...
